school_name_info: The official name of your educational institution that will appear on the unit plan document.
unit_title_info: A descriptive title for this unit of study. This should clearly indicate what students will be learning.
academic_year_info: Select the academic year when this unit will be taught.
subject: Subject
subject_info: Select the subject area for this unit. This determines which concepts, command terms, and ATL skills are available for selection.
myp_year_info: Select the MYP year level for which this unit is designed.
contributing_teachers_info: Add teachers who are contributing to the development and implementation of this unit plan.
number_of_lessons_info: This is automatically calculated by summing the lesson counts from all subunits in the Content tab.
display_mode_info: Choose how fields will be displayed throughout the unit plan. 'Current' mode shows traditional field layouts, 'Enhanced' mode shows modern streamlined interfaces, and 'Full' mode shows all fields from both modes.
